Module il.ac.kinneret.mjmay.hls.hlsjava
Package il.ac.kinneret.mjmay.hls.hlsjava.model

Class ClientActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.kinneret.mjmay.hls.hlsjava.model.ClientActions
  • public class ClientActions
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to perform changes on the client state, primarily things that have to do with communication with the father or other nodes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Michael J. May

        public static boolean localAdd​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Add a new file locally. Also notifies the father if needed
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file name to add locally
        Returns:
        Whether the addition was successfully done (and sent to the father if needed)

      • localRemove

        Remove a file that is found locally. Also notifies the father if necessary
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to remove
        Returns:

      • searchFather

        public static boolean searchFather​(java.lang.String searchFileName,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> results)
        Search for a file at the node's father (iteratively)
        Parameters:
        searchFileName - The file name to search for
        results - The list of results that will be shown on the screen (results are added here)
        Returns:
        True if the file was found. False otherwise.

      • iterateSearchSearch

        public static boolean iterateSearchSearch​(java.net.InetAddress searchAddress,
                                          int searchPort,
                                          java.lang.String searchFileName,
                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> results)
        Search for a file at a given IP address and port (iteratively).
        Parameters:
        searchAddress - The IP address to ask.
        searchPort - The port of the node to ask
        searchFileName - The file to ask for
        results - The list of results that will be shown on the screen (results are added here)
        Returns:
        True if the file was found. False otherwise.

      • retrieveFile

        public static boolean retrieveFile​(java.net.InetAddress address,
                                   int port,
                                   java.lang.String fileName,
                                   java.io.File destinationDirectory)
        Retrives a file from a remote node.
        Parameters:
        address - The IP address of the remote node
        port - The port of the remote node
        fileName - The file name to retrieve from the remote node
        destinationDirectory - The directory to store the downloaded file
        Returns:
        True if the file was downloaded successfully. False otherwise.
